mapper.select: SELECT loc_code as locCode, sido as sido FROM location WHERE parent_loc_code is null ORDER BY loc_code ASC

SELECT loc_code as locCode, sigungu as sigungu, sido as sido FROM location WHERE eupmyeondong is null AND sigungu is not null START WITH loc_code = #{locCode} CONNECT BY parent_loc_code = PRIOR loc_code ORDER SIBLINGS BY sigungu

SELECT loc_code as locCode, sido as sido, sigungu as sigungu, eupmyeondong as eupmyeondong FROM location WHERE eupmyeondong is not null START WITH loc_code = #{locCode} CONNECT BY parent_loc_code = PRIOR loc_code ORDER SIBLINGS BY eupmyeondong
